headlines.description: Leeds United boss Jesse Marsch got off to a losing start as his side suffered a 1-0 defeat away to Leicester City in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Marsch loses first match as Leeds boss

headlines.description: Brazilian midfielder Philippe Coutinho scored one and made another to help Aston Villa thrash Southampton 4-0 in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Coutinho stars as Villa thrash Southampton

headlines.description: Four second-half goals, including a strike from Christian Pulisic, eased Chelsea to a 4-0 win over Burnley, ending a tumultuous week at the club.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic scores as Chelsea ease past Burnley

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Newcastle United

headlines.description: — Ryan Fraser and Fabian Schar scored early for Newcastle as its English Premier League recovery survived a concerted Brighton fightback in a 2-1 win on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle wins to push further clear of EPL's bottom three

headlines.description: Brentford dealt a hammer blow to Norwich City's hopes of escaping relegation from the Premier League as Ivan Toney scored a hat-trick in a 3-1 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford see first top-flight hat trick in 85 years

headlines.description: Wilfried Zaha created the opener and then netted a penalty as Crystal Palace's excellent first half display saw them claim a deserved 2-0 away victo
headlines.shortLinkText: Zaha inspires Palace to victory at Wolves

headlines.description: Liverpool edged to a 1-0 victory over West Ham United on Sunday as they maintained pressure in the race for the Premier League title.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool edge to win over wasteful West Ham
